bayou.http

Class ThrottledHttpEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • bayou.http.ThrottledHttpEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpEntity, HttpEntityWrapper

    public class ThrottledHttpEntity
extends Object
implements HttpEntityWrapper
    Throttles the origin HttpEntity.

    The body of this entity will be the body of the origin entity, but throttled for throughput.

    See ThrottledByteSource.

    This entity is sharable iff the origin entity is sharable.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ThrottledHttpEntity(HttpEntity origin, int bufferSize, ThrottledByteSource.Curve curve)
      Create a throttled wrapper of the origin entity.
      ThrottledHttpEntity(HttpEntity origin, int bufferSize, long b0, long bytesPerSecond)
      Create a throttled wrapper of the origin source, with a linear curve.
